issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: ELB EMI check has issues with HA

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.summary: Auto Scaling service URL is not being populated in some setup

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In an HA setup the Autoscaling, CloudWatch and ELB services are initially correctly enabled on the coordinator:

CLC_146:
{code}
# euca-describe-services -U http://localhost
SERVICE	tokens         	eucalyptus     	10.111.5.146   	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8773/services/Tokens	arn:euca:eucalyptus::tokens:10.111.5.146/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_146         	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_146/
SERVICE	cluster        	PARTI00        	CC_147         	DISABLED  	47  	http://10.111.5.147:8774/axis2/services/EucalyptusCC	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:cluster:CC_147/
SERVICE	autoscaling    	autoscaling    	10.111.5.146   	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8773/services/AutoScaling	arn:euca:bootstrap:autoscaling:autoscaling:10.111.5.146/
SERVICE	jetty          	eucalyptus     	10.111.5.146   	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8773/services/Jetty 	arn:euca:eucalyptus::jetty:10.111.5.146/
SERVICE	dns            	eucalyptus     	10.111.5.146   	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8773/services/Dns   	arn:euca:eucalyptus::dns:10.111.5.146/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_146         	DISABLED  	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_146/
SERVICE	storage        	PARTI00        	SC_147         	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.147:8773/services/Storage	arn:euca:eucalyptus:PARTI00:storage:SC_147/

SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.111.5.146   	ENABLED   	47  	http://10.111.5.146:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.5.146/
SERVICE	eucalyptus     	eucalyptus     	10.111.5.147   	DISABLED  	47  	http://10.111.5.147:8773/services/Eucalyptus	arn:euca:eucalyptus:::10.111.5.147/

After restarting the eucalyptus-cloud service on the coordinator, the services cannot be used:

fields.summary: Autoscaling, CloudWatch and ELB services do not fail over in HA

comments.body: Changes made for EUCA-5948 currently prevent the loadbalancing service failing over in HA.

The autoscaling, cloudwatch and loadbalancing services will now be in the DISABLED state on hosts where the eucalyptus service is not ENABLED. When the eucalyptus service moves to ENABLED the autoscaling, cloudwatch and loadbalancing services will also become ENABLED (and will become DISABLED on any host where the eucalyptus service moves to a non-ENABLED state)

Fix Verified.

AS, ELB, CW all become enabled on secondary CLC when failing over from primary.

Installed Packages
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 3.4.0
Release     : 0.0.1495.20130920git5fb89121.el6
